name: LOOT_Handkerchief_A
description: A well-made, chequered hankie with only the faintest trace of its previous owner's leavings.

name: LOOT_Rope_A
description: A length of sturdy rope-- a mainstay in any traveller's pack.

name: JUNK_FishSkeleton_A
description: Most organic matter can be turned to purposes dark or light. Use with caution.

name: LOOT_DirtySocks_A
description: They don't appear to be particularly dirty, but the pungent odour of cheese wafting off of them could knock a horse on its hiney.

name: LOOT_Panties_A
description: It smells like this particular pair missed more than one laundry day...

name: LOOT_ClawFinger_A
description: The Black Ring have long studied the toxins that fester in the dessicated bodies of the Undead. Their charismatic necromancer Zaikk Dtell was the first to discover that by breaking off just one withered finger, a scheming villain can turn a potion of healing into one of poison...

name: LOOT_Bedlinen_Folded_A
description: Useless.

name: LOOT_Needle_A
description: Watch where you point that thing!

name: LOOT_Thread_A
description: To the world it may be a simple thread, but to a broken garment, it may be the world. Pair with a needle for the ultimate experience.

name: LOOT_Needle_Thread_A
description: A humble but handy pair, this needle and thread may require a bit of harrumph before they're able to aid you against the forces of evil.

name: LOOT_Hide_Animal_A
description: Even an amateur tanner could make a lovely piece of leather from this beautiful hide.

name: LOOT_WoodenStick_A
description: A very sturdy, short stick, and not as rotten as most of the other sticks around here. Useless to the untrained eye.

name: LOOT_WoodenBranch_A
description: Gnarled and twisted greyish wood. Very long, but hard and wieldy. It just needs that one little extra thing to make it really useful.

name: LOOT_MetalShard_A
description: A pretty sharp piece of metal. If you could make sure you didn't cut yourself handling it, it would make for a nifty weapon.

name: LOOT_PieceOfRock_A
description: You almost cut yourself handling this rock. If only you could cut others with it...

name: LOOT_Scraps_Cloth_A
description: Where the layman sees simple scraps, the crafty eye foresees all manner of handy applications.

name: LOOT_Scraps_Leather_A
description: Rich-smelling and supple, these leather pieces could be made into fine garments by the right craftsman.

name: LOOT_Scraps_Metal_A
description: A cog, a strip of aluminium, some old wire...

name: LOOT_Scraps_Plate_A
description: These thin, smooth sheets of metal could perhaps be used somewhere else.

name: LOOT_Scraps_Scale_A
description: Tiny metal loops and hooks hold small scales against one another. It would be a shame to waste such careful craftsmanship.

name: LOOT_Slime_A
description: | Yeuch. Ack. Why did you have to pick this up? Now it's all over your backpack. Ew. |

name: LOOT_Clay_A
description: | Yeuch. Ack. Why did you have to pick this up? Now it's all over your backpack. Ew. |

name: LOOT_AtaraxianArtifacts_A
description: It's hard to say whether this is magical or mechanical. Or both. You can probably put this thing to good use somehow...

name: LOOT_AtaraxianArtifacts_C
description: It's hard to say whether this is magical or mechanical. Or both. You can probably put this thing to good use somehow...

name: LOOT_VoidEggSpike_A
description: | Some voidwoken feature a spike like this. |

name: FUR_Bucket_A_Water
description: Ingredient

name: FUR_Bucket_A_Milk
description: Ingredient

name: CON_Potion_Empty_A
description: An empty vial waiting to hold whatever wild concoction you can brew.

name: ITEM_Log
description: A sturdy and unremarkable log, ready to be whittled into something more remarkable in your hands.

name: LAB_MortarPestle_A
description: This invaluable tool for the adept crafter is carved of darkly marbled stone, weathered by years of use and flecked with shards of stardust.

name: ITEM_Nails
description: A handful of sharp iron nails. Closer examination reveals it would be a sin to waste them.

name: ITEM_Soap
description: Scrub all you like, the Sourcehounds can still catch the scent of Source.

name: ITEM_Pillow
description: There are feathers inside...

name: ITEM_BrokenBottle
description: Those shards look pretty sharp...

name: ITEM_CookingPot
description: It's a cooking pot! For cooking!

name: FUR_WashTub_A
description: From the thick grime that encrusts this tub, you're quite sure you wouldn't want to soak in it too long...

name: ITEM_EmptyBottle
description: An empty bottle reeking of some rotten liquid that used to be inside.

name: ITEM_Bowl
description: No sadder sight to the hungry adventurer than an empty bowl.

name: CON_Drink_Cup_A_Empty
description: It runneth over not.

name: CON_Drink_Mug_A_Empty
description: Where's a trusty tap when you need one?

name: ITEM_Spoon
description: Useless.

name: LOOT_Jar_A
description: An empty jar dreaming of one day having its potential tapped.

name: ITEM_Ceramic_Plate_A
description: Who needs a plate where we are going?

name: ITEM_Ceramic_Pot_A
description: Useless.

name: ITEM_Jug
description: Useless.

name: ITEM_Jug_B
description: Useless.

name: ITEM_Jug_C
description: Useless.

name: ITEM_CuttingBoard
description: Chop, chop!

name: FUR_Cutlery_Fork_A
description: Useless.

name: CONT_Backpack_A
description: A charmed satchel capable of carrying far more brick-a-brack than most simple backpacks.

name: CONT_Backpack_Junk
description: A charmed satchel capable of carrying far more brick-a-brack than most simple backpacks.

name: CONT_Backpack_A_SourceHunter
description: A Sourcehunter's backpack.

name: LOOT_Scraps_Wood_A
description: Beware of splinters! These small chips and scraps of wood are more pernicious than a single log. Soften them up to avoid injury.

name: LOOT_Scraps_Wood_A_Mush
description: A dripping, pulpy mass of mushy wood and water. Better dry it out before it soaks through your whole pack!

name: TOOL_Trap_DisarmToolkit
description: A fiddly little kit that you can use to disable traps and mines. If only these were available for people, too…

name: TOOL_RepairHammer
description: A dinky hammer that looks perfect for repairing equipment on the move-- just don't try taking down an orc with it.

name: TOOL_Tong_A
description: A sturdy pair of blacksmith's pincers.

name: TOOL_Lockpick
description: A fine metal lock pick for prying open locks when you have, ahem, 'misplaced' the key. More intricate locks require lockpicking ability.

name: TOOL_IdentifyingGlass
description: Peer through this closely to analyse and classify equipment; it's as good as the skill of the one who holds it.

name: LOOT_String_Bow_A
description: An experienced marksman will want to keep more than one bowstring on hand. Even this string's high tensile strength won't last forever.

name: ITEM_SpoonGold
description: Pretty! Sell it.

name: ITEM_Rich_Cup_A_Silver
description: Useless but pretty. Sell it.

name: ITEM_Rich_Glass_A_Silver
description: Useless but pretty. Sell it.

name: ITEM_EmptyCupGold
description: Shiny!

name: ITEM_Rich_Glass_A
description: Useless but pretty. Sell it.

name: ITEM_Rich_Plate_A_Silver
description: Useless but pretty. Sell it.

name: ITEM_Rich_Plate_A
description: Useless but pretty. Sell it.

name: ITEM_Rich_Pitcher_A
description: Useless but pretty. Sell it.

name: ITEM_Rich_Plate_B
description: Useless but pretty. Sell it.

name: LOOT_Gems_Malachite
description: This forest-green gem is all the rage amongst the nobility. Sell it to a knowledgeable vendor and reap a fantastic reward.

name: HAR_Pearl_A
description: Shiny! Looks like the world is your oyster after all.

name: LOOT_Ruby_A
description: A rare, high-value gemstone called 'Godsheart' by the faithful Dwarven miners of the mountain region.

name: LOOT_Gems_Crystal
description: A rare element for which any jeweller would likely pay out the nose, ears, and other orifices.

name: LOOT_Gems_Diamond
description: A diamond this large must have been stolen from a royal family or perhaps prised from the recesses of a deep, dark mine by a very lucky explorer.

name: LOOT_Gems_Diamond_B
description: This thing belongs in a museum.

name: LOOT_Gems_Malachite_VW
description: A muddy gem you found on a voidwoken creature.

name: HAR_Pearl_A_VW
description: Shiny! But very dark. Probably because you got this from a voidwoken.

name: LOOT_Ruby_A_VW
description: You found this hazy ruby on a voidwoken creature.

name: LOOT_Gems_Crystal_VW
description: A rare crystal. Too bad some sort of nebula inside is making it dull.

name: LOOT_Gems_Diamond_VW
description: Too bad this diamond looks so... used.

name: LOOT_Gems_Diamond_B_VW
description: If it were not so dull, this would be an amazing gem.
displayName: Big Diamond From A Void Creature

name: FUR_Humans_Painting_A
description: The brooding gaze of a bearded man sears into your mind. Investigation of the plaque beneath shows this to be an artist's interpretation of Rhalic, one of the Seven.

name: FUR_Humans_Painting_B
description: The plaque on this well-framed piece proclaims the subject to be one Maxos, wizard exemplary.

name: FUR_Humans_Painting_C
description: Gleaming and burnished, the armour worn by the knight in this picture looks as if it cost an arm and a leg. And from the flecks of blood marring the gauntlets, perhaps it did.

name: FUR_Humans_Painting_D
description: Her mournful and slightly accusatory gaze pierces you from the centuries ago when she sat for this portrait.

name: FUR_Humans_Painting_E
description: A fellow so sly-looking one immediately wonders where he got the coin to pay the artist.

name: FUR_Humans_Painting_F
description: Is there any more inspiring view than wide sunny plains as seen from the back of a fine horse?

name: FUR_Humans_Painting_G
description: A seemingly peaceful scene, you can't help but notice the shadows drawing in upon the hapless figure on the shore of the lake.

name: FUR_Humans_Painting_H
description: A painting of the long trek Lucian made to the Council of Seven to be anointed as Divine.

name: FUR_Humans_Painting_J
description: From the sloppy brush strokes, you evince that this was one of the painter's first attempts at a pastoral scene. Nevertheless, it still captures the bucolic warmth of a summer afternoon in the countryside.

name: FUR_Humans_Painting_M
description: Mellow golden fields shine out from this landscape painting, though from the shape of the corn growing you can tell that the aspiring artist never visited the countryside.

name: FUR_Humans_Painting_N
description: Doesn't it seem true that the most distant hills always offer the most promise?

name: FUR_Humans_Painting_O
description: Violent storms crashing through a country idyll. Perhaps the artist meant it as a metaphor for the Divine Order's sweep through Rivellon?

name: FUR_Humans_Painting_P
description: A painting of the lonely turrets of the Divine Order scanning Reaper's Coast. Some Magister with a hankering for the sea must have painted it off-duty.

name: FUR_Humans_Painting_T
description: The final stand of Lucian and his troops against the Black Ring.

name: FUR_Humans_Painting_Tempest
description: Waves crash and toss the tiny boat into the reach of a monstrous sea beast. Just looking at the painting makes you feel seasick...

name: FUR_Humans_Painting_Leviathan
description: Sun, clouds and the open sea. Ah, to have the freedom of the leviathan beneath the waves.

name: FUR_Humans_Painting_Apollo
description: A rather fine painting of Lucian in his younger days.

name: FUR_Humans_Painting_I
description: Haughty and mysterious, the young woman gracing this cameo portrait wears the fashions of a bygone era.

name: FUR_Humans_Painting_L
description: Painting of Alexandar, son of Lucian the Divine and leader of the Divine Order.

name: FUR_Humans_Painting_R
description: Sun, clouds and the open sea. Ah, to have the freedom of the leviathan beneath the waves.

name: FUR_Humans_Painting_S
description: She holds that wine glass as if it would never be empty. A good reminder; we must drink the wine today for tomorrow there'll be none.

name: FUR_Humans_Painting_Church_I
description: A painting depicting the light of the Seven shining from the heavens upon the Divine Lucian and his followers.

name: FUR_Humans_Painting_Church_J
description: A painting depicting the winged salvation of Rhalic: one of the Seven and primary god of all humans.

name: BOOK_Paper_Sheet_A
description: A blank piece of paper that can be used to craft a scroll.

name: LOOT_Tooth_A
description: The product of a very conscientious tooth-brusher, this tooth makes a fine trophy of war.

name: LOOT_Tooth_A_Sharp
description: The product of a very conscientious tooth-brusher, this tooth makes a fine trophy of war.

name: LOOT_Claw_A
description: Lizard mystics adorn themselves with the claws and teeth of slain predators, thereby channelling the spirit of the hunt.

name: LOOT_Claw_A_Sharp
description: Lizard mystics adorn themselves with the claws and teeth of slain predators, thereby channelling the spirit of the hunt.

name: LOOT_Tusk_A
description: A fine trophy to commemorate the slaughter of an innocent beast.

name: LOOT_Antler_A
description: Mystics say the spirit of a stag remains in its antlers until they are burnt to ash. This spirit may be turned to magical purposes.

name: LOOT_Antler_A_Adult
description: Mystics say the spirit of a stag remains in its antlers until they are burnt to ash. This spirit may be turned to magical purposes.

name: LOOT_Tusk_A_Large
description: A fine trophy to commemorate the slaughter of an innocent beast.

name: HAR_Fish_Star
description: A little bit of the heavens from the depths of the ocean. Makes you think, eh?

name: LOOT_Feather_A
description: Who knows what heights this weather-beaten feather has seen? Perhaps hidden corners of Rivellon no human eye has ever breached.

name: LOOT_Paw_A_Rabbit_A
description: Some years ago, a superstition regarding lucky rabbits' feet led to a decimation of the local population by hopeful hunters. The trend was abandoned, but the rumours about the feet were never definitively disproven, either.

name: LOOT_Hair_A
description: They say the Lizard Mystics use every part of every animal they kill; perhaps you can find some use for this rather horrible clump of hair.

name: LOOT_Wool_A
description: The raw bounty of a fluffy, generous sheep. Not a ba-a-a-d haul, though you'll need to combine several batches to make a usable length of yarn.

name: LOOT_Yarn_A_Wool_A
description: Fine-spun yarn crafted from the fleece of happy sheep. Delicate on its own, but several skeins braided together might be of more formidable use.

name: LOOT_Skull_Bird_A
description: For a skull this small, it still oozes sadness. And magical potential.

name: LOOT_Skull_Human_A
description: Alas! Poor soul. Better that you weren't acquainted.

name: TOOL_Figurine_Wood_A
description: A hand-carved figurine of well-oiled Lapiterran wood. Those beady little eyes seem to follow you no matter where you place it.

name: LOOT_Foot_Chicken_A
description: The gnarled foot is closed in a fist-like ball; in this dry, mundane state, it isn't of much use to anyone.

name: LOOT_Foot_Chicken_A_Big
description: The gnarled foot is closed in a fist-like ball; in this dry, mundane state, it isn't of much use to anyone.

name: LOOT_Sinew_A
description: Supple, stretchy, and made from the finest beast-gut, this sinew is sure to serve you well.

name: LOOT_Tail_A_Rat_A
description: The lifeless, worm-like tail is stiff and hard. The animal's spirit has long fled this world.

name: LOOT_Tail_A_Rat_A_Long
description: The lifeless, worm-like tail is stiff and hard. The animal's spirit has long fled this world.

name: LOOT_Leg_Anthropod_A
description: Could be any invertebrate's leg, really. Ack.

name: LOOT_Flour_A
description: Made of wheat grown in the Rivellonian Grain Belt, this finely-milled flour is a primary ingredient in a variety of local delicacies.

name: LOOT_Scales_Animal_A
description: It's hard to tell what animal these are from, but they sure are strong and sturdy, and not slimy at all.

name: LOOT_Sinew_A_Strong
description: Supple, stretchy, and made from the finest beast-gut, this sinew is sure to serve you well.

name: LOOT_Eye_A
description: The eye is dim and dull; it's either dead or pretty depressed.

name: LOOT_Eye_A_Creepy
description: The eye is dim and dull; it's either dead or pretty depressed.

name: LOOT_Paw_A_Rabbit_A_Lucky
description: Some years ago, a superstition regarding lucky rabbits' feet led to a decimation of the local population by hopeful hunters. The trend was abandoned, but the rumours about the feet were never definitively disproven, either.

name: LOOT_Feather_A_Fancy
description: Who knows what heights this weather-beaten feather has seen? Perhaps hidden corners of Rivellon no human eye has ever breached.

name: LOOT_Fang_A
description: A fine trophy to commemorate the slaughter of an innocent beast.

name: LOOT_Skull_Human_A_Ancient
description: Alas! Poor soul. Better that you weren't acquainted.

name: LOOT_Shell_B_PilgrimsShell
description: |  This shell bears a pilgrim's mark. It looks quite useless but along with a magical ingredient, it can unlock power |

name: LOOT_SourcePuppet_Bead_A
description: | A gem that adorned the head of a puppet. |

name: LOOT_Goo_SewerSpider_A
description: | You'd pick up anything, wouldn't you? |

name: LOOT_Jar_MindMaggot_A
description: You're happy these mind maggots are trapped inside the jar...

name: LOOT_Claw_Crab_A
description: In a pinch, this curious little relic can serve as rudimentary tweezers or be enchanted to channel the beneficence of the Crab Matriarch. Your choice.

name: HAR_Fish_Star_Glowing
description: A little bit of the heavens from the depths of the ocean. Makes you think, eh?

name: LOOT_Ore_A_Iron_A
description: In this primitive state, the ore is little more than dead weight. But when wedded with a white-hot furnace...

name: LOOT_Ore_A_Silver_A

name: LOOT_Ore_A_BlackRock_A

name: LOOT_OreBar_A_Iron_A_Large

name: LOOT_OreBar_A_Steel_A

name: LOOT_OreBar_A_Steel_A_Large

name: LOOT_OreBar_A_Silver_A
description: A bar of pure silver that, hammered out, would surely make a fine, sharp something for the experienced weaponeer.

name: LOOT_Feather_A_Quill_A
description: Good for letter-writing, poetry-inscribing, will-defrauding, love letter-composing, and countless other literary tasks. Best paired with a pot of ink.

name: LOOT_Ink_Pot_A_Quill_A
description: This humble pair is capable of bringing tyrants and lovers alike to their trembling knees.

name: TOOL_Pouch_Dust_Bone_A
description: A heap of finely-powdered bone dust. If you listen closely, you could swear it whispers tragic tales of its origin. You stuff it deeper into your backpack. Nobody wants to hear that.

name: TOOL_Pouch_Dust_Star_A
description: A common ingredient in cosmetics, the enchanting gleam of this dust highlights even the plainest features with the lustre of the stars.

name: TOOL_Pouch_Dust_Star_B
description: A common ingredient in cosmetics, the enchanting gleam of this dust highlights even the plainest features with the lustre of the stars.

name: TOOL_Pouch_Dust_Pixie_A
description: You don't believe in pixies, do you? Well, all that matters is whether they believe in you. And their very belief is the secret ingredient often used in crafting items that require just a pinch of magic.

name: TOOL_Pouch_Dust_Pixie_B
description: You don't believe in pixies, do you? Well, all that matters is whether they believe in you. And their very belief is the secret ingredient often used in crafting items that require just a pinch of magic.

description: A gift to Rivellon from one of the elemental monarchs of the Realm of Faery. Talented craftsmen call it the shock that brings life to runes...

name: LOOT_Essence_Life_A
description: A single spark hovers delicately within this iridescent, enchanted orb.

name: LOOT_Essence_Air_A
description: A cool wind blows from the Spring Realm of Vernivia directly into this feather-light, enchanted orb.

name: LOOT_Essence_Earth_A
description: Fine sediments swirl from the Autumn Realm of Lapiterra directly into this dense, enchanted orb.

name: LOOT_Essence_Fire_A
description: White-hot embers blast from the Summer Kingdom of Caldia directly into this blazing, enchanted orb.

name: LOOT_Essence_Water_A
description: A cold stream of water flows from the Winter Kingdom of Hiberheim directly into this swirling, enchanted orb.

name: LOOT_Essence_Shadow_A
description: A dark, mysterious substance inches from realms unknown into this curious orb.

name: LOOT_Soul_Tormented_A
description: Held to your ear, the skull echoes a faint but horrible wail, like a soul suffering unimaginable tortures.

name: CONT_Barrel_A_Lid_A
description: Looks like someone blew their lid.

name: FUR_Bar_Barrel_A_Beer_A
description: This metal-bound wood exudes the fine scent of ruby-red ale.

name: BOOK_Book_A
description: Use to read.

description: Use to read.

description: Use to read.

description: Use to read.

name: LOOT_Orc_Tusk
description: Beneath the smell of rotten meat and scab of yellow filth, it appears to be made of ivory.

name: LOOT_Stone_A_Whet_A
description: A dense, rough stone capable of sharpening dull blades to a fine, honed edge.

name: FUR_Humans_Camping_Sleepingbag_B
description: Use this to rest your party when there are no enemies nearby.

name: FUR_LizardHeater
description: Good for keeping your skin and scales warm - and portable, to boot. Such convenience!

name: ITEM_SpiderEggBoss
description: It's a cooking pot! For cooking!

name: LOOT_Ingred_CrossbowWithoutString
description: Like a rose without its thorns, this beautiful (though neutered) object lacks the thing that gives it spirit. Unlike a rose, though, this crossbow can be mended.

name: LOOT_BodyPart_A
description: Looking fresh from some hellish abbatoir, it's hard to imagine that this dismembered torso was once part of a walking, talking, thinking being. Just like you.

name: LOOT_BodyPart_B
description: Sightless eyes stare in terror at whatever horrors marked their last moments.

name: LOOT_BodyPart_C
description: A mysterious chunk of flesh. This could be anything. Or anybody.

name: LOOT_BodyPart_D
description: On the one hand, there's a lot to be said for picking disembodied limbs off the ground and stowing them in your rucksack. On the other hand... oh, there isn't one.

name: LOOT_BodyPart_E
description: Looks like somebody out there doesn't have a leg to stand on...

name: LOOT_BodyPart_F
description: A mysterious chunk of flesh. This could be anything. Or anybody.

name: LOOT_BodyPart_G
description: Streaked with filth and rust-coloured blood, this severed arm is no longer any good to its previous owner.

name: LOOT_BodyPart_H
description: All five toes... check! An attached leg... uhhhhhh.

name: CONT_Barrel_Oil_A
description: What do you get the pyromaniac who has everything?

name: CONT_Barrel_A_Water
description: Water sloshes inside...

name: CONT_Barrel_Ooze_A
description: The skull truly says it all.

name: CONT_Barrel_DeathFog_A
description: When the only option is indiscriminate annihilation...

name: TOOL_VoodooDoll
description: A stuffed, woven doll that looks like it could be dangerous to your enemies … if you knew what to do with it.

name: TOOL_Shovel_A
description: Use to start digging on the spot. Who knows what you might find?

name: TOOL_Shovel_Improvised_A
description: Use to start digging on the spot. Who knows what you might find?

name: LOOT_Guitar_Lute_A
description: | A musical instrument |

name: PART_DIY_Bow_Branch
description: Fine-grained wood lovingly cleaned and oiled, ready to be turned into a weapon of destruction. The artistic woodcarver within you laments.

name: LOOT_Toy_TeddyBearClean
description: A hand-knitted teddy bear, clearly loved by a child.

name: LOOT_Toy_TeddyBearWornOff
description: A worn and frayed teddy bear, clearly loved by generations of children.

name: LOOT_Toy_WoodenBlocks_A
description: A child's wooden block, scuffed and worn from happy hours of play.

name: LOOT_Toy_WoodenBlocks_B
description: A child's wooden block, scuffed and worn from happy hours of play.

name: LOOT_Toy_WoodenBlocks_C
description: A child's wooden block, scuffed and worn from happy hours of play.

name: LOOT_Toy_WoodenBlocks_D
description: A child's wooden block, scuffed and worn from happy hours of play.

name: LOOT_Toy_Ball_Red_A
description: | A potential deadly weapon in a kids hands. |

name: UNIQUE_ARX_ToyScenery_Barrel
description: |Just a mini barrel|

name: GRN_Ingredient_Flask_Empty_A
description: This empty flask is not much to look at. You have a strange feeling that throwing it far away would improve the aesthetics somewhat; might as well fill it with something first.

name: GRN_Ingredient_Fuse_A
description: To a grenade maker, fuses are an abundant pleasure: fuses to be bought, fuses to be found, a whole world of fuses! Of course, the REALLY fun part is lighting them.

name: GRN_Ingredient_Cylinder_Empty_A
description: An empty, bulbous cylinder stoppered with pockmarked and tarnished brass. The embossed metal worker's mark hails from a faraway military munitions factory.

name: GRN_Ingredient_Round_Empty_A
description: Two half-spheres of thick yet brittle stone. They are currently empty; why not fill them with something exciting?

name: GRN_Ingredient_Holy_Empty
description: This intricately designed orb is festooned with swirls of gold and looks like it cost a pretty penny. In delicate script is written: 'The gods bestow health on those who reject material possessions.' Sure they do.

name: GRN_Ingredient_Love_Empty_A
description: An empty perfume bottle with the lingering hint of an exceedingly beguiling scent. Your only desire is to keep sniffing it forever.

name: WPN_ArrowShaft_A
description: A perfectly ordinary arrow shaft. Combine arrow shafts with special arrowheads to create powerful arrows with special effects.

name: WPN_ArrowHead_A
description: A perfectly ordinary arrowhead. Combine arrowheads with other objects to create special arrowheads.

name: WPN_ArrowHead_SlowDown_A
description: Enemies too fast for you? Combining this fine arrowhead with an arrow shaft will ensure that you won't be slow on the draw.

name: WPN_ArrowHead_Water_A
description: Popular with the kids of Driftwood on sunny days, if you affix this to an arrow you're sure to make a splash.

name: WPN_ArrowHead_Antler_A
description: Legends tell tales of the charging power of a stag being harnessed within just one arrow. Combining this arrowhead with an arrow shaft could let you discover whether those legends are true.

name: WPN_ArrowHead_Poison_A
description: An evil-smelling arrowhead that fizzes and hisses beneath its venomous coating; try not to inhale as you craft with it.

name: WPN_ArrowHead_Fire_A
description: Although it's too hot to hold for long, crafting this arrowhead into a special arrow could bring just the right amount of heat to any battle.

name: WPN_ArrowHead_Steam_A
description: Although it hisses louder than a Caldian steam bath, combining this arrowhead with an arrow shaft will make it a powerful projectile.

name: WPN_ArrowHead_Freezing_A
description: A gleaming arrowhead perpetually coated with condensation; if you don't use it to craft a special arrow, you might as well have it handy to keep your drinks cold.

name: WPN_ArrowHead_Explosive_A
description: Highly flammable and prone to unsettling rattling noises, the less time this arrowhead spends in your backpack, the better.

name: WPN_ArrowHead_Charming_A
description: This arrowhead is like an adorable lucky charm. It could make a powerful arrow. If, of course, you could be persuaded to part with it.

name: WPN_ArrowHead_Stunning_A
description: This arrowhead displays stunning craftsmanship. Quite literally.

name: WPN_ArrowHead_Static_Could_A
description: A tiny vial almost bursting with the electrical storm fizzling within. Once crafted into a special arrow, it will strike the battlefield like lightning.

name: WPN_ArrowHead_Poison_Cloud_A
description: Best to keep this one stowed deeply. Rivellonian tavern myths oft return to the tragic story of poor Elgrid, whose demise was certain the day he accidently sat on a quiver of these.

name: WPN_ArrowHead_Smokescreen_A
description: A Kallavian arrowhead, notched in the traditional manner and steeped in an enigmatic potion designed for those who operate using deceit and obfuscation.

name: WPN_ArrowHead_CursedFire_A
description: Although it's too hot to hold for long, crafting this arrowhead into a special arrow could bring just the right amount of heat to any battle.

name: WPN_ArrowHead_BlessedWater_A
description: | Blessed water arrowhead description |

name: WPN_Arrow_A
description: Are you sure? Normal arrows are limitless but special arrows are not. Try a better combination with the arrowhead before creating an arrow.

name: WPN_Arrow_SlowDown_A
description: This arrow is sure to slow your foes in their tracks as well as put a spring in your step.

name: WPN_Arrow_Water_A
description: The artistry is all in the cunning way you affix the flask of water to the arrow. Or so you've been told.

name: WPN_Arrow_KO_A
description: A lead-weight arrow that's almost too heavy to fire. Almost.

name: WPN_Arrow_Poison_A
description: Look closely; the only visible difference between this arrow and a normal arrow can be seen in the sizzling dents within the tip of the arrowhead.

name: WPN_Arrow_Fire_A
description: A fire arrow that is hot to the touch. You probably want to keep it safely away from oils and suchlike.

name: WPN_Arrow_Cloud_Steam_A
description: A hissing arrow packed tight with steam. This baby is ready to explode; shield your eyes as you nock and load.

name: WPN_Arrow_Freezing_A
description: A frost-capped arrow that bites deep and stops targets in their tracks.

name: WPN_Arrow_Explosive_A
description: Known as 'Arrow of the Dragon' to the renowned Lapiterran archers, this explosive projectile will just as soon blow up in your face as at your enemy's feet.

name: WPN_Arrow_Charming_A
description: This cute little arrow infused with a charming potion is quite something. You really, really, really like it.

name: WPN_Arrow_Stunning_A
description: An arrow infused with the fury of the air. If you listen closely you can hear it whistle and seethe with anticipation.

name: WPN_Arrow_Cloud_Static_A
description: Wreathed in sparking energy, this arrow can unleash a tempest upon its unlucky target.

name: WPN_Arrow_Poison_Cloud_A
description: A sharp arrow shimmering beneath a toxic green mist; best not to inhale as you release this venomous cloud.

name: WPN_Arrow_SmokeScreen_A
description: An occluding arrow was made from a recipe stolen from the chronicles of the Kallavi, an elusive troupe of burglars.

name: WPN_Arrow_CursedFire_A
description: A fire arrow that is hot to the touch. You probably want to keep it safely away from oils and suchlike.

name: WPN_Arrow_BlessedWater_A
description: | Blessed water arrow description |

name: WPN_Arrow_Debuff_All_A
description: A cursed arrow that lands like a witch's kiss, draining the fervour of any foe.
